title: Cafe Vida
typeOfFood: Vegan, Pizza, International, Organic, Raw, Buffet, Juice bar, Take-out
description: An all-vegan/organic plant-based restaurant in the middle of the tourist street Sagarnaga, right by the Witches Market. Serves organic, healthy meals at low prices. Also has raw cakes and smoothies with no refined sugar. Almost all dishes are gluten free and never uses soy meat. Offers a soup-of-the-day-buffet with bread and different types of hummus - eat as much as you like for 28 bs (price as of May 2016).
